hey guys im having a problem using hfc sdk as an interface between my app and chaincode. im using hyperledger v0.6. The thing is, that I am unable to get errors with `invokeTx.on('error', function(results) {....})`
where `var invokeTx = userObj.invoke(invokeRequest)`
this only happens when using invoke. in the case of query everything works perfect.
but on error is never triggered in invokes
the funny thing is that i get the error in the log of the peer node but it is not caught by `invokeTx.on('error', ....)`

<@U0KPFAZNF|ghaskins> uploaded a file: <https://hyperledgerproject.slack.com/files/ghaskins/F3V5KKZNY/-.c|Untitled> and commented: <@U0ULK2JPP> <@U12452RAP> regarding above: working on a patch that splits the Platform responsibilities like this

file.name: -.c
file.title: Untitled
file.preview_highlight:
type Platform interface {
	ValidateSpec(spec *pb.ChaincodeSpec) error
	GetDeploymentPayload(spec *pb.ChaincodeSpec) ([]byte, error)
	GenerateDockerBuild(spec *pb.ChaincodeSpec, tw *tar.Writer) error
}

initial_comment.comment: <@U0ULK2JPP> <@U12452RAP> regarding above: working on a patch that splits the Platform responsibilities like this

text: The idea being that what was formerly "WritePackage()" is now two phases
for something like golang/java, the deployment payload would be near identical to what it is today, sans the Dockerfile
for car, it would no longer be a car encapsulated in a .tgz with Dockerfile, but just the raw .car data
and lastly, GenerateDockerBuild() will JIT it into a .tgz complete with Dockerfile that may be sent to the docker daemon to be built
Yes, I also thought about that platform interface could be extend.
So do you mean you are working on that?
<@U0KPFAZNF>: <@U0ULK2JPP> since you guys are refactoring this area, i will abandon this CR
<@U12452RAP> yes, but not with the same goals you had
Will be back to see again when you guys tasks done
ok
theres probably still room for your type of improvement
havent decided if Ill try to tackle or defer, but it probably does make sense to coordinate so we dont stomp on each others work
